text:
I have a warning for overwriting a function. It is on purpose, so how can I suppress the warning? I actually extend that method for `show` and call the non-extended one within my overwriting. It should be safe.
```WARNING: Method definition show(IO, Base.CoreLogging.LogLevel) in module CoreLogging at logging.jl:127 overwritten in module LocalSearchSolvers at C:\Users\jeanf\.julia\dev\LocalSearchSolvers\src\logging.jl:4.
  ** incremental compilation may be fatally broken for this module **```

text: It is not safe (hence the warning) and you should try to achieve what you want to achieve in another way.
